keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Saeed al-Batati reported from Dowaan, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo. Merna Thomas contributed reporting from Cairo, Rick Gladstone from New York, and Helene Cooper from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Capitalizing on the expanding war in Yemen and the collapse of its government, Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula is carving out more territory for itself.

headline.print_headline: War in Yemen Is Allowing Qaeda Group to Expand
headline.main: War in Yemen Is Allowing Qaeda Group to Expand

snippet: Capitalizing on the expanding war in Yemen and the collapse of its government, Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula is carving out more territory for itself.
abstract: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula, capitalizing on expanding war in Yemen and collapse of its government, reportedly takes control of Riyan Airport and nearby military base and Dhabah oil terminal.
